title: Add
text: Simplify the numerator and denominator by combining fractions so that the final product is a single fraction over a fraction.
speech: Simplify the numerator and denominator by combining fractions so that the final product is a single fraction over a fraction.
pacedSpeech: Simplify the numerator and denominator by combining fractions so that the final product is a single fraction over a fraction.

title: Reciprocal
text: Rewrite the denominator as a reciprocal and change the sign to multiplication.
speech: Rewrite the denominator as a reciprocal and change the sign to multiplication.
pacedSpeech: Rewrite the denominator as a reciprocal and change the sign to multiplication.

title: Simplify
text: Multiply and then reduce the two fractions.
speech: Multiply and then reduce the two fractions.
